title: Linite
description: A Ninite-style bulk package installer for Linux distributions.

title: InfraWise
description: A financial modeling tool for comparing Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) between cloud and on-premise infrastructure solutions. Make informed infrastructure decisions with detailed cost breakdowns and breakeven analysis.

title: Tools
description: A comprehensive collection of interactive educational tools for learning computer science algorithms, data structures, and system design concepts.
